instruction: Please implement a sea turtle customs management system for enterprise information management and customs clearance process optimization. The system should have functionalities such as file management, approval management, contract management, procurement management, production management, warehouse management, sales management, transportation management, customs declaration management, account management, financial management, and report management. Users should be able to log in, browse related information, perform business operations, query customs clearance status, and achieve integrated management of goods flow, capital flow, and information flow. Assign gold to body backgrounds and dark goldenrod to main components.

Please implement a freelancer platform website to connect employers and freelancers. The website should have basic features such as messaging, bidding, and project management. Users can register as either employers or freelancers, post projects, bid on projects, communicate with other users, and manage project progress. The website should also have a user center for displaying personal information, project records, and account management. Define the background as light salmon and components as tomato.

Please implement a cloud database version deployment platform for automatic auditing and deployment of cloud database scripts. The platform should have functionalities for script specification, script scanning, script auditing, and script deployment. Users should be able to upload scripts, and the system should automatically audit the scripts to see if they comply with the company's database specifications. If the scripts do not comply, the system should provide error prompts. Users should be able to view the audit results and choose to deploy scripts that have passed the audit. Choose floral white for global background and dark red for all components.

Please implement a mobile application to provide teaching assistance for elementary and middle school students and teachers. The application should have functionalities such as course management, homework publishing and submission, grade inquiry, and teaching resource sharing. Teachers should be able to publish homework, view grades, and share teaching resources through the application, while students can submit homework, view grades, and browse teaching resources. The application should also allow users to manage their personal information and account settings. Assign moccasin to body backgrounds and burlywood to main components.

Please redesign a website to achieve a consistent theme style and improve brand appeal. The website should have a clear navigation menu, an eye-catching homepage display, a concise introduction to products or services, and an easy-to-use contact method and user interaction interface. The design should consider improving user experience and brand recognition. Set overall background to light goldenrod yellow, then style components with olive drab.

Please implement an accessory management system for managing warehouse operations such as stocking, withdrawal, and allocation of accessories. The system should have functionalities for managing accessory information, stocking, withdrawal, allocation, maintenance, and scrapping. Users should be able to log in, browse accessory information, perform operations such as stocking, withdrawal, allocation, maintenance, and scrapping, and query accessory inventory and operation records. Use pale green as the default background and forest green for component styling.

Please implement a Taobao affiliate website for promoting and commissioning third-party products. The website should have functionalities for product display, link conversion, ordering, order tracking, and commission calculation. Users should be able to browse product lists, convert links to purchase products, and place orders. After the order is placed, the system should automatically track the order status, complete the commission calculation, and return the commission amount to the user. The backend management terminal should be able to manage product information, promotion positions, user information, order information, and more. Set overall background to thistle, then style components with medium purple.

Please implement a Gansu Agricultural Bank mobile app that provides banking services. The app should have functionalities for user login, account management, transfer, payment, balance inquiry, and more. Users should be able to log in, view account information, make transfers and payments, check balances, and manage account settings. Color the background using morning fog and set component styles to dim gray.

Please implement a product information query website to provide product information. The website should have functionalities for getting product master data, store products, product prices, product inventory, store lists, and store details. Users should be able to log in, browse product information, get product activity lists, get product activity categories, get activity product lists, get personalized categories, and get personalized product lists. The website should also have the ability to modify the sales status and shelf status of store products. Set page background to cream; color all components with dark teal.

Please develop a search and monitoring website to improve performance and security. The website should have functionalities for searching, monitoring, and alerting. Users should be able to log in, perform searches, view monitoring data, receive alert notifications, and manage security settings. The website should have performance optimization, security enhancement, and monitoring and alerting capabilities. Use pale ash as the default background and slate gray for component styling.

Please implement an efficient and easy-to-use HTTP server website for providing fast development network services. The website should have the functionality to handle HTTP requests and responses, support multiple HTTP methods, handle different types of request data, and return corresponding response data. Users should be able to send HTTP requests through the website, view the response results, and manage the website's configuration and settings. Specify medium aquamarine as the base color and sea green for all components.

Please implement a webpage for the "Quan Min U Hui Zhu Shang Li Min" activity, which displays a red packet consumption activity. The webpage should include three sections: city consumption rankings, bank consumption rankings, and personal consumption rankings. The city consumption rankings should display a heat map of cities in Fujian Province, while the bank consumption rankings and personal consumption rankings should display consumption rankings and details. Users should be able to view their own consumption records and rankings, and receive recommendations for participating merchants based on their location. Assign silver to the background and dark slate blue to the UI elements.

Please implement a mobile application with functions such as login, registration, search, chat, and image processing. Users should be able to log in and register through the application, use the search function to find relevant information, engage in real-time chat, and upload, edit, and share images. The application should also have features such as personal information management, friend management, and message notifications. Set overall background to dust white, then style components with forest green.

Please implement a PHP web application based on nanomsg to provide real-time messaging functionality. Users should be able to send and receive messages through the web interface, and the application should have functionalities for publishing, subscribing, receiving, and processing messages. Users should be able to create and manage their own message channels and choose to receive or ignore messages from other users. Implement styling with dust white for the background and forest green for components.

Please implement a website for a WeChat mini-program cloud development tool package to help developers quickly develop mini-programs. The website should have functionalities such as tool package download, installation guide, development documentation, and sample code. Developers can download the tool package from the website, install it according to the installation guide, and refer to the development documentation and sample code to quickly develop mini-programs. Set the background color to dust white and the component color to forest green.

Please implement a database maintenance website for providing technical support and performance optimization. The website should have functionalities for automated installation, upgrade, and rollback, as well as log analysis to identify issues and provide corresponding solutions. Users should be able to log in, submit technical support requests, view problem-solving progress, and download relevant technical documents. Assign faint peach as the background color and apply coral to all elements.

Please implement an application with embedded H5 pages, featuring multi-page development. Users should be able to access different pages within the application, including activity pages and blogs. The application should have the functionality to record user behavior and optimize page performance. Users should be able to access technical documentation and display pages through the application. Declare smoke as the global background color and midnight blue for all UI pieces.

Please implement a blog filter page to filter and display blog posts. The page should have the functionality to filter articles by category, tags, date, and other conditions. Users should be able to select different filter conditions, view the corresponding article list, and click on the article title to view the article details. Assign melon as the background color and apply tomato to all elements.

Please implement a dynamic web application that integrates with Airtable to display and manage data. Users should be able to log in, browse and edit data, create new records, update existing records, and delete records. The website should have data filtering, sorting, and searching capabilities. Users should be able to filter data based on different conditions, sort data by different fields, and search for specific records. Set light sky blue as the body background and use deepskyblue for the UI.

Please implement a messaging website for interacting with a JMS server to send and receive messages. The website should have functionalities for sending messages, receiving messages, and viewing message history. Users should be able to log in, send messages to the JMS server, receive messages from the JMS server, and view historical message records. Use honeydew for the outer layout and forest green for UI blocks.

Please implement an adult content subscription website with subscription, payment, and content management functions. Users can register and log in to the website, browse and subscribe to different content creators, pay to view exclusive content, and manage their subscription records. Content creators can upload and manage their content, set subscription prices, and view their revenue records. Select gold for layout background and dark goldenrod for component details.

Please implement a community website that provides a lightweight component framework. The website should have functionalities for rapid development, unified programming style, and component-based modeling. Users should be able to log in, browse, search, and download components, submit their own components, and communicate with other users. Define background as light coral; define components with brown.

Please implement a Lan Garden mini-program and backend management system for managing products such as flowers. The system should have functionalities for product management, order management, and user management. Users should be able to browse products like flowers, place orders for selected products, and view order status. Administrators should be able to manage product information, process orders, and manage users. Set the background color to melon and the component color to tomato.

Please implement a green plant mini-program for sharing and purchasing green plant-related products. The mini-program should have community features such as topic discussions, experience sharing, cultivation recommendations, and cultivation plans. At the same time, it should include an online mall where users can browse and purchase green plant-related products and support online payment functions. Users should be able to register and log in to the mini-program, manage personal information, and view order records. Assign alice blue to the background and cornflower blue to the UI elements.

Please develop a website to display certificates, including certificate images, content, and related pages. The website should have the functionality to display 7 new certificates, each with its own page containing the certificate image, name, description, and related content. Users should be able to browse the certificate pages, view certificate details, and navigate to related sub-pages. The website should ensure that all pages are designed consistently and linked correctly. Apply peach puff to the canvas background and firebrick to all visible components.

Please implement a website for comparing and matching Excel spreadsheet data with database data. The website should have functionalities for uploading Excel files, selecting databases, comparing data, and displaying comparison results. Users should be able to upload Excel files, select the database to compare with, start the comparison process, and view the comparison results, including successfully matched and unmatched data. Initialize the background color with faint peach and component color with coral.

Please implement an e-reading mini-program that displays traditional Chinese cultural course content. The mini-program should have functionalities such as a work showcase, course reading, peripheral mall, and marketing. Users should be able to browse and read course content, upload their own work to the showcase, purchase related products in the mall, and participate in marketing activities. Configure all backgrounds with pale goldenrod and all components with dark khaki.

Please create a webpage to display customer and vehicle information. The webpage should include customer information, customer-uploaded files, soft pull reports, and vehicle details. Customer information should include customer name, address, and other relevant details. Customer-uploaded files should include license copies, files, and images. Soft pull reports should display relevant information for the customer. Vehicle details should include vehicle identification number, make, model, year, and mileage. Select medium spring green for layout background and green for component details.

Please implement a legal automation tool for analyzing and reviewing legal contracts. Users should be able to upload contract files (PDF or text format), and the tool should automatically analyze the contract, extract key clauses and relevant information, and provide a summary report. The tool should have a simple and intuitive interface, be able to handle PDF or text files, and provide basic report generation functionality. Set all pages to have a light pink background and hotpink components.

Please implement a resource management website that provides resource file downloads and management. The website should have functionalities for uploading, downloading, searching, and managing resource files. Users should be able to log in, upload resource files, download required resource files, and search for specific resource files. The website should also have a categorization and tagging feature for resource files, allowing users to quickly find the resources they need. Apply cream to the canvas background and dark teal to all visible components.

Please implement a Lua script execution environment for PostgreSQL database. The environment should have functionalities for running Lua scripts, managing script execution, and interacting with the database. Users should be able to write and execute Lua scripts, manage script execution results, and interact with the PostgreSQL database. Assign ivory to body backgrounds and chocolate to main components.

Please create a digital name card website containing the company logo, name, address, and contact information. The website should have a responsive design that adapts to different browsers and devices. The digital name card should clearly display company information, including the company logo, name, address, phone number, email, and more. Users should be able to easily browse and access company contact information. Select faint peach for layout background and coral for component details.

Please implement a Lai Fu Hui website for displaying and managing corporate theme colors and product information. The website should have the functionality to display different theme colors, including different configurations on the homepage. Users should be able to browse product information, manage their shopping cart, and perform payment operations. The website should also have a login function, allowing users to log in and manage their accounts. Declare mint as the global background color and dark sea green for all UI pieces.

Please implement a web application for sales funnel and landing page management, used to create and manage multiple sales funnels and landing pages. The application should have functionalities for quickly creating new funnels, editing content, optimizing performance, and more. Users should be able to create and manage multiple sales funnels, edit the content within the funnels, optimize funnel performance, and view funnel analytics reports. Use a light sea green background and apply dark slate gray to the UI components.

Please implement a component library website based on Vue, providing various components and design resources. The website should have functionalities for component display, design resource download, and documentation reference. Users should be able to browse and search for components, view component usage examples and documentation, download design resources, and use these components in their own projects. Assign sky blue to body backgrounds and navy to main components.

Please create a "Magical Wonderland" themed family fairy tale website that includes a story, pictures, and a webshop. The website should have the functionality to display the story and pictures, and users should be able to browse through them. The webshop should have the functionality to automatically process orders, and users should be able to browse products, place orders, and make payments. The website should have a user-friendly interface that is easy for families to access and use. Select linen white for layout background and burlywood for component details.

Please implement a Magic Dome game platform where users can play games by scanning and paying. The platform should have functionalities for game display, payment, and game launch. Users should be able to browse the game list, select a game, scan and pay, launch the game, and view game progress. The platform should also have user management, order management, and game management functions. Use pale green for container backgrounds and sea green for component visuals.

Please implement an official store website for Taiper, selling home goods products such as pillows, mattresses, and smart beds. The website should have functionalities for browsing products, placing orders, and making payments. Users should be able to log in, browse different types of home goods products, select product specifications (such as size, color, material), and place orders and make payments. The backend management should be able to set up promotional activities and manage orders. Set champagne as the body background and use burnt sienna for the UI.

Please implement a tool to export database table field null value rates for analyzing null value rates in database tables. The tool should have functionalities for connecting to a database, inputting table names and conditions, and exporting table field information. Users should be able to input database connection information, select tables to analyze, set conditions, and export field comments, data quantity, and null value rates to an Excel file. Initialize the background color with light beige and component color with sienna.

Please implement a backend management system for managing and maintaining business data. The system should have functionalities for login, permission management, and menu management. Users should be able to log in, browse and manage business data, including forms, lists, and detailed information views, and perform data statistics and analysis. Style the layout with cool gray in the background and charcoal for the interface.

Please implement an MVC framework website that supports hot deployment. The website should have functionalities such as controllers, services, data access, and SQL business logic code. Developers should be able to easily debug and deploy code, enabling rapid development and testing. The website should support hot deployment, allowing developers to modify and update code easily. Initialize the background color with salmon and component color with crimson.

Please implement a virtual security checkpoint mini-program for publishing human and vehicle control and sending real-time warning messages. The mini-program should have functions for publishing control, viewing control lists, and sending real-time warning messages. Users should be able to log in to the mini-program, publish human or vehicle control, view control lists, receive real-time warning messages, and handle them accordingly. Set all pages to have a lavender blush background and pale violet red components.

Please implement a web template system for displaying dynamic content. The system should have functionalities such as variable replacement and loops, allowing users to add dynamic program blocks to templates. Users should be able to create and edit templates, add variables and dynamic content, and preview template effects. The system should also have template management functionality, allowing users to manage and maintain created templates. Select cornsilk for layout background and rosy brown for component details.

Please implement an emergency mini-program that provides emergency services and mutual aid functions. The mini-program should have functionalities for adding emergency locations, sending SOS help requests, and mutual aid. Users should be able to log in to the mini-program, add and manage emergency locations, send SOS help requests, and assist other users. The mini-program should also have a backend management function for managing emergency locations, user information, and help records. Specify magenta as the base color and dark violet for all components.

Please implement a data visualization website for displaying employment and market supply and demand data. The website should have multiple visualization modules, including employment industries, overall learning progress, and population changes. Users should be able to browse different modules, view corresponding data visualization charts, and perform filtering and sorting. The website should also have real-time update functionality, reflecting changes in the data in a timely manner. Define background as plum; define components with dark magenta.

Please implement a government affairs app that provides information and services related to government affairs. The app should have functionalities for viewing representative information, submitting suggestions, querying government affairs news, and participating in discussions. Users should be able to log in, browse representative information, submit suggestions, query government affairs news, and participate in discussions. Use desert sand as the screen background and sienna for component highlights.

Please implement a general management backend website for system management and configuration. The website should have functionalities for user login, registration, permission management, and system configuration. Users should be able to log in, browse system information, configure system parameters, manage user permissions, and view system logs. Set gold as the body background and use dark goldenrod for the UI.

Please implement a multi-player online AR game for multiple users to play together and fight monsters. The game should have multi-player online functionality, allowing users to interact and collaborate in real-time. Users should be able to create or join game rooms and play together with other users to fight monsters. The game should have a monster state machine that can simulate the behavior and reactions of monsters. Users should be able to use AR technology to scan their environment and engage in battles with monsters in a virtual scene. Set light sky blue as the body background and use deepskyblue for the UI.

Please implement an online learning app that provides online learning services. The app should have functionalities for online learning cards, recorded course learning, live course learning, online exams, and community Q&A. Users should be able to log in, browse and select different courses, engage in online learning, participate in online exams, and ask and answer questions in the community. Apply theme using floral white as background and dark red for elements.

Please implement a web application for WeChat and Alipay recharge. Users should be able to perform recharge operations for WeChat and Alipay through the application, including entering the recharge amount, selecting the payment method, generating a payment QR code, and so on. The application should be able to update the payment status in real-time and provide users with corresponding prompts when the recharge is successful or failed. At the same time, the application should also include an error handling mechanism to solve problems such as QR code expiration. Color the background using dust white and set component styles to forest green.

Please implement a smart community property management mini-program for community property management and services. The mini-program should have functionalities for property payment, property management, online repair reporting, owner activity registration, and online shopping. Users should be able to log in, browse related information, make property payments, manage property information, submit repair requests, register for owner activities, and shop in the online store. Apply magenta for layout; use dark violet for buttons and cards.

Please implement a file upload website to upload files to the server. The website should have functionalities for file upload, file management, and file download. Users should be able to log in, upload files, manage uploaded files, and download required files. The website should also have file type filtering and search functions to help users quickly find the files they need. Apply porcelain for the layout background and olive for interactive elements.

Please implement a blind box mini-program that allows users to open blind boxes and receive physical rewards. Users can select the set they want to open, then consume lucky coins to open the blind box, obtain set fragments, and synthesize the set after collecting all the fragments to redeem physical rewards. The mini-program should have a blind box area and a set area, where users can select sets and open blind boxes in the blind box area, and view set fragment information and synthesize sets in the set area. Use morning mist as the default background and navy for component styling.

Please implement an operation and maintenance management system for functions such as large screen display, device management, operation and maintenance management, user management, alarm management, and report management. The system should allow users to log in, browse device information, manage user accounts, set alarm rules, and generate reports. The system should also have real-time monitoring and data analysis capabilities, displaying device operating status and system performance metrics. Apply light green for the layout background and dark olive green for interactive elements.

Please implement a website that embeds RSS information into articles and pages. The website should have the functionality to manage RSS information, including adding, deleting, and editing RSS sources. Users should be able to choose from different display options, such as list, grid, or card layout, and customize the displayed content, such as title, summary, and publication time. The website should also have flexible configuration options to match the website's style. Color the background using bisque and set component styles to dark salmon.

Please implement a schedule tool website for managing users' schedules and tasks. The website should have functionalities for creating, editing, and deleting schedule events. Users should be able to log in, browse their own schedules, create new events, edit existing events, and delete unnecessary events. The website should also have reminder and notification functions to remind users of upcoming events. Assign alice blue to the background and cornflower blue to the UI elements.

Please implement a network lending intermediary service platform for providing loan and repayment services. The platform should have functionalities for applying for loans, repayment, and maintaining user information. Users should be able to log in, apply for loans, view loan status, make repayments, and maintain their personal information. The platform should also have functionalities for auditing user information, generating payment schedules, and handling overdue payments. Set page background to spring green; color all components with lime green.

Please implement a WeChat mini-program for visit reservations and product purchases. The mini-program should have functionalities for visit reservations, product purchases, and payment. Users should be able to log in, browse products, reserve visit times, place orders for selected products, and make payments. The mini-program should also include a personal center where users can view their orders, browsing history, and personal information. Apply seashell to the canvas background and indian red to all visible components.

Please implement an iOS database management application for managing SQL and SQLite databases. The application should have functionalities for creating, opening, renaming, and deleting databases. Users should be able to create new databases, open existing databases, rename databases, and delete unnecessary databases. Additionally, the application should provide data editing and querying functions, allowing users to edit and query data within the databases. Assign papaya whip to the background and peru to the UI elements.

Please implement a local life service mini-program that provides services such as on-site repair, cleaning, accompaniment, and medical care. The mini-program should have functionalities for service appointment, order management, and payment. Users should be able to browse the service list, make an appointment for the required service, view the order status, make a payment, and evaluate the service. Merchants and service providers can log in to the mini-program, manage their services and orders, receive appointment requests, and provide services. Assign navajo white to the background and tan to the UI elements.

Please implement a low-code admin panel for managing and configuring the system. The panel should have functionalities for user management, data management, and system settings. Users should be able to log in to the panel, browse, edit, and delete data, manage user permissions, and configure system parameters. The panel should be able to connect to a database, view table data, and perform data operations. Style the layout with apricot in the background and chocolate for the interface.

Please implement a data visualization website to display various types of data, such as marketing data, production data, and user data. The website should have multiple visualization charts to intuitively display data features. Users should be able to browse different types of data and view corresponding charts and statistical information. The website should also have the function to adapt to different screen sizes, ensuring consistent display effects on different devices. Assign light yellow to body backgrounds and goldenrod to main components.

Please implement a database inspection website for monitoring and optimizing database performance. The website should have functionalities for monitoring database performance, analyzing data, solving performance problems, and optimizing database configurations. Users should be able to log in, view database performance reports, analyze data, optimize database configurations, and ensure the stable operation of the database. Set all pages to have a faint gray background and slate gray components.

Please implement a big data visualization website to display product data. The website should have functionalities for data cleaning, data visualization, and data analysis. Users should be able to log in, browse product data, perform data analysis, view data reports, and set data alerts. The website should support multiple data formats, including tables, charts, maps, and more. Style all pages with a vanilla background and dark goldenrod components.

Please implement a health care mini-program that provides services such as consultation, viewing health reports, and registration. The mini-program should have functionalities for viewing health reports, making appointments, and online consultation. Users should be able to log in, browse their own health information, view health reports, make appointments, conduct online consultations, and manage their consultation records. Assign apricot to the background and chocolate to the UI elements.

Please implement a content management system for news editors to edit and publish articles. The system should have functionalities for content editing, cache management, sensitive word and blacklist processing, content publishing, and user and permission management. Editors should be able to log in, edit and publish video or graphic articles, and manage published content. The system should also be able to automatically publish content to various terminals, such as H5, WEB, APP, and mini-programs. Establish silver as the main background and dark slate blue for the controls.

Please implement a smart BI website for enterprise management and data statistics. The website should have functionalities for data visualization, report generation, and permission management. Users should be able to log in, browse data statistics reports, generate custom reports, and manage user permissions. The website should have strict role-based authentication, ensuring that only authorized users can access and operate on corresponding data. Specify magenta as the base color and dark violet for all components.

Please implement a payment website that allows users to apply for installment payments and manage orders. The website should have functionalities such as real-name authentication, facial recognition, contract signing, and purchasing products. Users should be able to log in, apply for installment payments, view order status, and make payments. The institutional end can manage large orders, small orders, and overdue orders, and implement collection and other functions. The background management system can perform operational management, account management, audit management, financial management, statistical management, and other functions. Use a almond background and apply sienna to the UI components.

Please implement a customizable Blockly web application where users can create and edit Blockly projects. The application should have functionalities for creating, editing, and saving Blockly projects, and users should be able to customize the appearance and behavior of Blockly. Users should be able to log in, browse, create, and edit Blockly projects, and save their work. Use azure as the default background and slate blue for component styling.

Please implement an admin dashboard to manage payment gateways for MikroTik User Manager Hotspot. The dashboard should have the functionality to manage multiple virtualized instances of MikroTik CHR RouterOS v6, interact with MikroTik User Manager v4, and support mobile money payments API. Users should be able to log in to the dashboard, browse and manage hotspot clients, configure payment gateways, view transaction records, and more. Use violet as the screen background and indigo for component highlights.

Please implement a 5G message delivery system for uploading files, creating message templates, and sending 5G messages. The system should have three modules: media management, template management, and message management. Users should be able to upload images, audio, and video files and use them to create message templates. Then, users can use these templates to create messages and send them to specific phone numbers. The system should allow users to manage and edit message templates and preview the message effects in real-time. Define the background as magenta and components as dark violet.

Please implement a multimedia terminal management system for managing and displaying data. The system should include a management end and a client end, where the management end is used for uploading data and managing the client end, and the client end is used for receiving data and displaying it. The management end should have the function of sending tasks to the client end at scheduled times and be able to remotely shut down the client end. The client end should be able to receive and display the data sent by the management end and interact with the management end. Use ivory for the background and chocolate for components.

Please implement an AI voice-over website for dubbing services. The website should have functionalities for uploading videos, selecting voice styles, and generating dubbing. Users should be able to upload video files, choose different voice styles and languages, generate corresponding dubbing files, and download or share the generated dubbed videos. Choose blanched almond for global background and dark slate gray for all components.

Please implement a cloud washing data visualization website to display real-time data. The website should have functionalities for data display, video playback, and user evaluation. Users should be able to log in, browse real-time data, play videos, evaluate videos, and view real-time data for stores and factories. Apply theme using light blue as background and dark blue for elements.

Please implement an assembly-type BIM system for building design and construction drawing generation. The system should have functionalities such as importing CAD files, setting process standards, automatically generating walls and windows, arranging software and hardware, generating construction drawings with one click, and automatically generating engineering quantities and material lists. Users should be able to import CAD files, set process standards, automatically generate walls and windows, and generate construction drawings, as well as calculate engineering quantities and material lists. Use light sea green for the outer layout and dark slate gray for UI blocks.

Please implement a live streaming website that provides video streaming and user interaction features. The website should have functionalities for user login, video playback, subscription, and rewards. Users should be able to log in, browse and play live videos, subscribe to channels of interest, and reward their favorite live streams. The website should also have the ability to collect, organize, and analyze user behavior logs to understand user behavior and optimize the website. Initialize the background color with moccasin and component color with sandy brown.

Please implement a web and user activity monitoring system that sends SMS and email alerts. The system should be able to monitor website traffic and user account activities, and send real-time alerts. Users should be able to customize alert settings, choose to receive SMS or email alerts, set alert frequency and content. The system should also be able to record and analyze user activities, providing detailed reports and statistical data. Select bisque for layout background and dark salmon for component details.

Please implement a white wine cellar e-commerce website for displaying and selling white wine products. The website should have functionalities for categorizing and displaying white wine, showing historical transaction values, providing storage and delivery services, authenticating the genuineness of the wine, and allowing users to purchase and inquire about products. Users should be able to browse different types of white wine, view their historical transaction values, purchase white wine, submit inquiries, and use storage and delivery services. The website should also have an authentication system to ensure the authenticity of the wine. Use lemon chiffon as the default background and olive for component styling.

Please implement a core scheduler website for managing and scheduling business data. The website should have functionalities for consuming data, distributing data, receiving data, and processing data. The system can retrieve data from a queue and distribute it to various collection endpoints, receive return data from the collection endpoints, process the data, and then send it to a data collector. Users should be able to log in to the website to monitor and manage the entire scheduling process, including viewing data processing status and setting scheduling parameters. Define the background as medium spring green and components as green.

Please implement an oil station management website for managing oil station merchants, users, products, payments, points, and discounts. The website should have functionalities for merchant management, user management, product management, payment management, point management, and discount management. Users should be able to log in, browse and manage merchant information, product information, payment records, point records, and discount coupons. The website should also have download management, team management, voice broadcast, and ticket management functions. Assign navajo white to body backgrounds and sienna to main components.

Please implement a data management website based on a graph database for storing and querying complex data. The website should have functionalities for data import, data query, and data visualization. Users should be able to log in, import data, query data, view data relationships, and visualize data. Assign seashell to body backgrounds and indian red to main components.

Please implement a mock trading Android app for users to engage in virtual stock trading. The app should have functionalities for user registration, login, buying and selling stocks, viewing trading history, and tracking virtual portfolios. Users should be able to use mock funds for trading, and the app should provide real-time data to simulate a realistic trading experience. Administrators should be able to manage user accounts, add mock funds, create new users, and view and manage user portfolios through an admin panel. Specify cream as the base color and dark teal for all components.

Please implement an e-commerce platform related to tea culture for selling tea leaves and tea utensils. The platform should have functionalities for displaying information, selling products, and user management. Users should be able to browse tea culture-related information, learn about tea types, effects, and taboos, directly purchase tea-related products on the platform, and manage their account information. Specify light yellow as the base color and dark khaki for all components.

Please create a web application for a mobile app, to display and provide the functions of the mobile application. The web application should have functionalities for user login, registration, application function display, and application download. Users should be able to browse the application's functions, download the application, and view the application's related information. Choose almond for global background and sienna for all components.

Please implement an instant messaging website that supports real-time message transmission between multiple online users. The website should have functionalities for sending and receiving messages, creating and managing group chats, and adding and managing friends. Users should be able to log in, send text, images, and videos, create and join group chats, add and remove friends, and view message records. Configure all backgrounds with apricot and all components with chocolate.

Please implement a landing page and confirmation page for selling a service. The landing page should have a scheduling feature, allowing users to schedule appointments through the Calendly booking page. The confirmation page should be able to display successful appointment information and provide a professional and consistent design style. Users should be able to access the landing page, browse service information, schedule a service, and view the appointment result on the confirmation page. Color the background using light coral and set component styles to indian red.

Please implement a mobile H5 application for the poultry industry, used by farmers and administrators for data entry, form submission, and document review. The farmer-side application should have data entry and form submission functions, while the administrator-side application should have document review and data integration display functions. Users should be able to log in and access different menus and functions based on their roles. The application should be able to distinguish between roles based on entrance configuration parameters and integrate with PC-side permission configuration. Assign baby blue to the background and navy to the UI elements.

Please implement an Excel data processing web application to process Excel files and scan QR codes to retrieve detailed information. The application should have functionalities for user login, scanning QR codes, and viewing detailed information. Users should be able to log in, scan QR codes, and view relevant details. Admins should be able to configure file locations, sync schedules, and manage users. The application should include three user roles: Basic User, Admin, and Super Admin. The primary function of the QR codes will be to link to detailed information. Set the background to wheat, and apply goldenrod to components.

Please implement a routing management website for managing and configuring routing rules. The website should have functionalities for adding, deleting, modifying, and viewing routing rules. Users should be able to log in, browse existing routing rules, add new routing rules, delete unnecessary routing rules, modify existing routing rules, and view detailed information about routing rules. Assign light goldenrod as the background color and apply goldenrod to all elements.

Please implement a coffee ordering mini-program that provides personalized coffee ordering services. The mini-program should have functionalities such as personalized coffee recommendations, customizable flavor adjustments, social sharing, appointment pickup, and member management with a point system. Users should be able to browse the coffee menu, select coffee based on their taste preferences, customize flavor parameters, share their coffee orders, schedule pickup times, and view their member information and points. Implement styling with ivory for the background and chocolate for components.

Please implement a shopping cart management system for online shopping. The system should have functionalities for browsing products, adding products to the cart, modifying product quantities in the cart, removing products from the cart, and submitting orders. Users should be able to log in, browse products, add products to the cart, view cart contents, submit orders, and view order status. Apply theme using light coral as background and brown for elements.

Please implement a web application with natural language processing and artificial intelligence capabilities. The application should have text analysis, search, and recommendation functions, and be able to perform sentiment analysis, text summarization, and language translation. Users should be able to communicate in real-time using the audio call feature. The application should also be able to analyze user behavior and interaction patterns to improve its performance. Users should be able to log in, browse and search content, use the audio call feature, and view analysis reports. Style the layout with thistle in the background and rebecca purple for the interface.

Please implement a web application that supports custom CSL citation styles. Users should be able to select different citation styles, and the application should correctly format the citations. The application should have functionalities for uploading, downloading, and managing citation styles. Users should be able to browse and edit citation styles and preview the formatted results in real-time. Use powder blue in the background layer and medium blue for the component layer.

Please implement a mobile web email proxy website for browsing and managing emails. The website should have functionalities for browsing emails, sending emails, deleting emails, and searching emails. Users should be able to log in, browse email directories such as inbox, sent box, and spam, read and reply to emails, and manage their email accounts. Set the background color to pale ash and the component color to slate gray.

Please implement a Bitcoin investment website for users to invest and manage their Bitcoin. The website should have functionalities such as a user account dashboard, admin dashboard, and financial/investment calculator. Users should be able to log in, browse investment products, make investments, view investment records, and manage their accounts. The website should also have a referral system, where users can invite friends to join and receive rewards. Use khaki in the background layer and dark khaki for the component layer.

Please implement a custom AI learning platform that provides a personalized learning experience. The platform should have functionalities for course management, learning path planning, intelligent recommendation, and learning record tracking. Users should be able to log in, browse and select courses, create learning plans, track learning progress, and receive intelligent recommendations for learning resources. Apply misty rose for the layout background and medium violet red for interactive elements.

Please develop a music player application for playing and managing audio files. The application should have basic functions such as play, pause, and stop, as well as add, delete, and rename audio files. Users should be able to browse and select audio files, adjust the playback order, set playback modes, and more. Configure all backgrounds with khaki and all components with dark khaki.

Please implement a website search console verification fix tool. The tool should have functionalities for verifying website ownership, diagnosing website issues, and submitting a website map. Users should be able to input a website URL, verify website ownership, diagnose website issues, submit a website map, and view verification results. Assign light green to body backgrounds and dark olive green to main components.

Please implement a mobile-end big data management system for handling resource release, review, and statistics. The system should include functions such as resource list and details, resource search, to-do list and details, application list and details, and statistics. Users should be able to browse resource lists, search for resources, view to-do items, submit applications, and view statistical data. The system should be able to display detailed resource information, including resource name, type, description, and more. Use pale goldenrod as the default background and dark khaki for component styling.
